items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for December 15, 2025
items.description: The American pyramid scheme, sisters who turn into dogs, a feast of food writing, and more of today's best book deals.

items.title: York County Library (SC) Bans “Gender Identity” Books for Minors, Strips Citizens of First Amendment Rights
items.description: York County Library passed a new policy that bans "gender identity" books from any youth sections in the library.

items.title: 2025’s Best Cookbooks and Food Writing, BIPOC Edition
items.description: Learn how to make Sudanese doughnuts, birria tortas, incredible chutneys, and more in these amazing cookbooks.

items.title: A Deep Dive into the Rich History of Black Bookstores
items.description: Black bookstores are and have always been not only retail spaces, but spaces for community and revolution.

items.title: 8 of the Best New Cozy Mysteries to Read This Winter
items.description: From a sweet potato pie-related murder to a father-daughter food detective duo, there's a perfect new cozy mystery here to read this winter.
